Description: This Trust Interoperability Profile specifies the requirements needed to meet the NIEF Certificate Policy

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Access Enforcement
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: This Trustmark Definition defines conformance and assessment criteria for compliance with minimum security requirements for access enforcement as related to overall access control requirements.

TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Name: Approval of System Maintenance Activities
TrustmarkDefinitionReference.Description: This Trustmark Definition defines conformance and assessment criteria for compliance with minimum security requirements for approval of system maintenance activities as related to overall maintenance requirements.
